sentences.en: A fledgling white-tailed kite [bottom] grabs a vole from its father 100 feet above the ground in mid-flight.
sentences.cn: 一只年幼的白尾鸢（下面那只）在离地面100英尺的高度的飞行中从父亲爪上攫取野鼠。

sentences.en: A little vole with a bag on his back was singing and walking across a field.
sentences.cn: 一只小田鼠背着包,快活地唱着歌儿,在田野上走.

sentences.en: A water vole swam vigorously upstream.
sentences.cn: 一只水鼠奋力向上游游去.

sentences.en: All for the little darling vole.
And because of the oxytocin and vasopressin, they want to have sex with the same vole.
sentences.cn: 又因为催产素和垂体后叶加压素的作用，它们只想与同一田鼠做爱。

sentences.en: Clean - cultivation reduces vole survival and reproduction.
sentences.cn: 无覆盖耕作可减少田鼠的存活和繁殖.

sentences.en: Nadia Vole: I'm Nadia Vole. I work for Mr. Sayle . Press and public - relations.
sentences.cn: 娜佳沃尔: 我叫娜佳沃尔. 我为塞尔先生作媒体公关工作.

sentences.en: Objective To comprehend the vole of MRI in diagnosing multiple clerosis.
sentences.cn: 目的了解核磁共振成像(mri)在诊断多发性硬化中的作用.

sentences.en: She went the vole and finally settled on teaching.
sentences.cn: 她一次又一次地变换职业,最后选定了教书.

sentences.en: The black - bellied vole shuttles in and out of its underground burrow, ever alert to dangers outside.
sentences.cn: 黑腹绒鼠在地洞里进出穿梭, 总是对外面的危险十分警觉.

sentences.en: The details of what is going on — the vole story, as it were — is a fascinating one.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样,最让人着魔的是田鼠爱情故事的进展细节.

sentences.en: The two vole species are not abundance than 99 % alike, genetically.
sentences.cn: 如就基因而言,这两个物种超过99%的部份绝无二致.

sentences.en: The virus sliced into the vole's DNA and inserted the instructions to create more receptors.
sentences.cn: 该病毒嵌入田鼠的DNA并插入创造更多受体的指令.

sentences.en: Why, he has gone the vole - has been soldier, ballad - singer, traveling tinker and is now a beggar.
sentences.cn: 唔, 他什么事情都干过 — 当过兵, 做过民谣歌手, 干过流浪补锅匠,而现在却是个乞丐.

trans.tran_cn: 野鼠类，全胜，大满贯，孤注一掷
trans.tran_en: a small animal like a mouse with a short tail that lives in fields and woods and near rivers
